Nerangs.ab: ... tā̊sāc yazom. ka dō-hōmāst yazēd ā gyāg airyaman dudīgar abāz xwāndan aṣ̌əm vohū sē airiiamanō išiiehe sraōϑrəm āiiese yešti xšnūmaińe isat̰ uuāstrahe zaraθuštrahe ašạōnō frauuašә̣̄e xšnaōθra yasnāica vahmāica xšnaōϑrāica tā sar

"At ... tā̊scā yazamaide, when he performs a Dō-Hōmāst, at this passage, they should recite three Aṣ̌əm Vohū and (continue with) airiiamanō išiiehe sraōϑrəm āiiese yešti xšnūmaińe isat̰uuāstrahe zaraθuštrahe ašạōnō frauuašә̣̄e xšnaōθra yasnāica vahmāica xšnaōϑrāica until the end."
